prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: He has worked on scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society and is actively involved in the tech community. Pavol regularly gives lectures at conferences, serves as a jury member, and mentors in various Czech and international competitions.
